snippet: The company also reported better-than-expected quarterly revenue.
abstract: Groupon reports first-quarter loss of $4 million, or 1 cent a share, compared with loss of $11.7 million, or 2 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 7.5 percent to $601.4 million.
lead_paragraph: The company also reported better-than-expected quarterly revenue.

headline.seo: Groupon Narrows Its Loss After String of Disappointing Results
headline.main: After a String of Disappointing Results, Groupon Narrows Its Loss
headline.print_headline: After a String of Disappointing Results, Groupon Narrows Its Loss
